feed.title: Wizarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Wizarr: 2025.6.5
entry.content:
🎉 What’s New in Wizarr 2025.6.5

This release brings some exciting enhancements, a brand-new UI feature, and a bunch of behind-the-scenes improvements!

✨ New Features

  • 🧙 Editable Wizard UI: You can now manage wizard steps directly from the interface – add, edit, reorder, or delete steps with ease.
  • 📦 ROMM Support Added: Wizarr now plays nicely with [ROMM](https://github.com/rommapp/romm), making retro game library integration smoother than ever.

🛠 Improvements & Fixes

  • 🧠 Fixed API issues with Jellyfin/Emby where parameters weren't passed correctly.
  • ⚙️ Improved asset build system for a faster, more reliable setup.
  • 🪲 General bug fixes and performance tweaks to keep things running smoothly.

📦 Dependency Updates

  • HTMX updated to 2.0.5 for better frontend performance.
  • Markdown, Boto3, and Cachetools bumped to their latest stable versions for security and stability.

👋 New Contributors

  • Big thanks to @techfahter and @arch1eOS for their first contributions!

entry.title: New release for Wizarr: 2025.7.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes: - Plex API hotfix (deprecated) - Deleting a Step Causes broken CSS

What's Changed

  • Bump @tailwindcss/cli from 4.1.10 to 4.1.11 in /app/static by @dependabot in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/659
  • Bump tailwindcss from 4.1.10 to 4.1.11 in /app/static by @dependabot in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/660
  • build(deps): bump htmx.org from 2.0.5 to 2.0.6 in /app/static by @dependabot in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/663
  • build(deps): bump python-dotenv from 1.1.0 to 1.1.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/664
  • build(deps): bump boto3 from 1.38.41 to 1.38.46 by @dependabot in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/665

Full Changelog: https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/compare/2025.6.5...2025.7.1

entry.title: New release for Wizarr: 2025.7.2
entry.content:
• 🎉 Added multi-server invites
  • 🧙‍♂️Added new Custom Wizard Bundles
  • ✨ Revamped settings interface and introduced a new dashboard
  • 🖼️ UI overhaul
  • 🤝 Multi-Admin Support

entry.title: New release for Wizarr: 2025.7.3
entry.content:
• Rethink of Now Playing Cards following feedback
  • Added experimental support for Komga
  • Fixed bugs and optimisations
